## BundledCode class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

[FunctionCode](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.aws_cloudfront.FunctionCode.html) that bundles multiple functions in a single file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BundledCode extends cloudfront.FunctionCode 
```
**Extends:** cloudfront.FunctionCode
